metadata.feature_description: Allows selection and configuration of Google Analytics account, web property, and data stream

steps.action: Navigate to Persona Bar > Settings > Connectors
steps.expected: Connectors page loads with list of available connectors
steps.actual: Connectors page loaded successfully showing all available connectors including Google Analytics 4

steps.action: Click Connect button on Google Analytics 4 connector
steps.expected: Configuration form expands showing Measurement ID field and options
steps.actual: Form expanded showing Measurement ID text field and Track for Administrators checkbox

steps.action: Leave Measurement ID field empty and click Save
steps.expected: Validation error message appears preventing save
steps.actual: Error notification displayed: 'Tracking Code Cannot Be Empty'

steps.action: Enter valid GA4 Measurement ID 'G-TESTID1234' in the field
steps.expected: Measurement ID is accepted in the field

steps.actual: Checkbox is now checked, indicating administrator tracking will be enabled

steps.action: Click Save button with Measurement ID and Track for Administrators configured
steps.expected: Configuration saves successfully with success notification
steps.actual: Success notification 'Item successfully saved.' displayed. Green checkmark icon appears next to connector. Delete Connection button becomes available.

steps.action: Verify connector shows Edit button after save
steps.expected: Connector shows Edit button instead of Connect
steps.actual: Connector collapsed showing Edit button and green checkmark indicating connected status

steps.action: Click Edit to reopen configuration form
steps.actual: Measurement ID shows 'G-TESTID1234' and Track for Administrators checkbox is checked - values persisted correctly

steps.expected: Form closes and changes are discarded

steps.action: Click Edit to verify original value was preserved
steps.actual: Original value 'G-TESTID1234' preserved - cancel discarded unsaved changes correctly

steps.expected: Connection is deleted and form returns to initial state
steps.actual: Success notification 'Item successfully deleted.' displayed. Connector now shows Connect button and green checkmark is removed.

observations: The Google Analytics 4 connector in the UI provides a simplified configuration with manual Measurement ID entry rather than OAuth-based account/web property/data stream selection.

Code analysis revealed that authorize.js contains OAuth-based configuration with Account, Web Property, and Data Stream dropdowns, but this UI is not currently loaded in the connector form. The feature appears to require Google OAuth authorization first before the account selection dropdowns would appear.
The tested connector uses direct Measurement ID input (G-XXXXXXXXXX format) which is the standard GA4 approach.
The 'Track for Administrators' option allows enabling/disabling analytics tracking for admin users.
Delete Connection immediately removes the configuration without a confirmation dialog.
